items.details:
Upcoming Tests

Science  - Topic 3 - Weather - November 26th
Math - Topic 6 - Area - November 26th

Social Studies

World Heritage Day – Ireland Project (THIS THURSDAY)

Great job in class today working on your Ireland booth. Now it is time to finalize your ideas and prepare everything with your group.

Your booth must include:

A short teaching part (1 minute)
A fun, hands-on activity (3–4 minutes)
Green, white, and orange decorations
Fair teamwork from everyone
Wear green clothes
The event is THIS THURSDAY, so you only have a few days left.

This week, finish all details and make sure your group is fully prepared.

On Tuesday, I need to see what each person in your group has completed, so please come ready to show your work.

Important:

When each team arrives, greet them with the Irish word “Dia dhuit” (hello).
When they leave your booth, say “Slán” (goodbye).
Give a short explanation and then move quickly into your activity.
Talk within your teams so everyone knows exactly what they are doing.

Remember: short facts + hands-on fun = the best booth!

Korean

Complete pages 190-202

Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it.
